page.title: 06KIPPEN GUN CLUB
page.content: {Kippen Gun Club}was founded in{1970}by four or five local men. It is situated just out of Kippen on land belonging to{Mr.Tom Baird of Dasher farm.}It has expanded a great deal since then and is now regarded as one of the best clubs in the United Kingdom.Each year the{Scottish Championships}are held at Kippen in June and every four years the{International}between Scotland, England,Ireland and Wales is held here. In{1986}the{Commonwealth Games {Shooting Events}will be held at Kippen and will be attended by the{Queen}and {Prince Charles.
